instanceTypes.description: 1 vCPU (shared physical core) and 0.6 GB RAM
1 vCPU (shared physical core) and 1.7 GB RAM
Our Type 0 configuration is a general use "cloud killer" server, with a Intel Atom 2.4Ghz processor and 8GB of RAM.
Our Type 1 configuration is a zippy general use server, with an Intel E3-1240 v3 processor and 32GB of RAM.
Our Type 2 configuration is the perfect all purpose virtualization server, with dual E5-2650 v4 processors, 256 GB of DDR4 RAM, and six SSDs totaling 2.8 TB of storage.
Our Type 2A configuration is a 96-core dual socket ARM 64 beast based on Cavium ThunderX chips
Our Type 3 configuration is a high core, high IO server, with dual Intel E5-2640 v3 processors, 128GB of DDR4 RAM and ultra fast NVME flash drives.
Our Type S server packs in 96TB of storage and is perfect for large object or file needs.
